text: Allah jis ki rehnumaai kare wo to hidaayath yaafta hai aur jise wo raah se bhatkaade na mumkin hai ke tu us ka madadgaar us ke siva kisi aur ko paaye, aise logo ka hum baroz qayaamath aundhe mu hashr karenge, dara haal ye ke wo andhe, gonge aur behre honge, un ka thikaana jahannam hoga, jab kabhi wo bujne lagegi hum un par ose aur bhadkaa denge
